info: motd: Message of the Day: usage: `motd [-mdh] [--mobile|--desktop|--help]`
flags:
flags:
-m     --mobile     Display motd optimized for mobile.
-d     --desktop    Display motd optimized for desktop.
-h     --help       Display this information.

The Developers’ Guild aims to explore computer science through hands-on experience. 
As  a  Guild,  we strive to become involved with the Silicon  Valley  community  to 
connect with all of the opportunities around us. Members are strongly encouraged to 
contribute ideas and questions to form a collaborative atmosphere.

To get started, enter "guild --start".

The Developers’ Guild aims to explore computer science
through  hands-on  experience. As  a Guild, we  strive 
to become  involved with the Silicon  Valley community 
to  connect with all of  the opportunities  around us. 
Members  are strongly  encouraged to contribute  ideas 
and questions to form a collaborative atmosphere.

To get started, enter "guild --start".
